description:
CWE-1104: Use of Unmaintained Third-Party Components vulnerability exists that could cause complete
control of the device when an authenticated user installs malicious code into HMI product.

product.name: PFXST6000, PFXSTM6000, PFXSP5000, PFXGP4100 series with Pro-face BLUE runtime
Harmony (Formerly Magelis) HMIST6, HMISTM6, HMIG3U, HMIG3X, HMISTO7 series with EcoStruxure Operator Terminal Expert runtime
